ubm:variation.name: parent-child No Cycles
ubm:variation.description: 204.04 Parent-child arcs must not form any cycles. This schema and linkbase creates a set of concepts (named conceptA to conceptL) and creates a presentation network of parent-child arc roles that contains no cycles.

ubm:variation.name: Taxonomy defined linkbaseRef role
ubm:variation.description: 205.01 A new role for use on a linkbaseRef is defined in RoleSSchema.xsd. A new extended link element and arc type element are also defined in this schema. The RoleS.xsd taxonomy schema uses the new role on the linkbaseRef element pointing to RoleS_linkbase.xml

ubm:variation.name: SameCalculationArcsButDifferentWeights
ubm:variation.description: 209.01 Checking that trivial undirected cycles (created by a pair of arcs with the same source and destination) are detected. As per http://xbrlbugs.decisionsoft.com/show_bug.cgi?id=7 such cycles are no longer illegal.

ubm:variation.name: SamePresentationArcsButDifferentPreferredLabels
ubm:variation.description: 209.01 Checking that trivial undirected cycles (created by a pair of arcs with the same source and destination) are detected. As per http://xbrlbugs.decisionsoft.com/show_bug.cgi?id=7 such cycles are no longer illegal.

ubm:variation.name: SameDefinitionArcs
ubm:variation.description: 209.01 Checking that trivial undirected cycles (created by a pair of arcs with the same source and destination) are detected. As per http://xbrlbugs.decisionsoft.com/show_bug.cgi?id=7 such cycles are no longer illegal.

ubm:variation.name: SameDefinitionArcsButDifferentArcroles
ubm:variation.description: 209.01 Checking that trivial undirected cycles (created by a pair of arcs with the same source and destination) are detected. As per http://xbrlbugs.decisionsoft.com/show_bug.cgi?id=7 such cycles are no longer illegal.

ubm:variation.name: Two calculation arcs are equivalent.
ubm:variation.description: 210.01 A prohibiting arc of a higher priority overrides a relationship, thus removing the calculation relationship. The instance would be invalid if the relationship had not been prohibited.

ubm:variation.name: Two calculation arcs are not equivalent (differing order).
ubm:variation.description: 210.01 A prohibiting arc of a higher priority overrides a relationship, thus removing the calculation relationship. The instance would be invalid if the relationship had not been prohibited.

ubm:variation.name: Two calculation arcs are equivalent (default order).
ubm:variation.description: 210.01 A prohibiting arc of a higher priority overrides a relationship, thus removing the calculation relationship. The instance would be invalid if the relationship had not been prohibited.
